Title: Provides for a continuation of senior citizen rent increase exemption benefits after a period of ineligibility
Summary: Provides for a continuation of senior citizen rent increase exemption benefits after a period of ineligibility due to a head of household's temporary increase in income.
LawCode: Amd ยง26-605, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to continuation of senior citizen rent increase exemption benefits after a period of ineligibility due to a head of household's temporary increase in income
